channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel Corporation -- Intel Core-based microprocessors
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel Corporation -- Intel Core-based microprocessors

item.title: CVE-2018-3665|2024-09-17T01:01:36.405Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20core-based%20microprocessors
item.description: System software utilizing Lazy FP state restore technique on systems using Intel Core-based microprocessors may potentially allow a local process to infer data from another process through a speculative execution side channel.
